website_summaries.verdict: Whether you have a large family or just need something to help keep your bathroom organized, this toothbrush holder fits the bill. Great value.
pros: Family-friendly design holds up to nine regular and six electric toothbrushes
Four upper compartments offer plenty of storage space
cons: Overloading may cause it to fall
Storage compartments are a bit narrow

website_summaries.verdict: Perfect for small bathrooms shared by many people. Helps to reduce clutter on countertops.
pros: Cups to protect toothbrushes from germs
cons: Some have found the storage containers to be too small

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought this was going to be way too big for what I was planning to use it for, but I installed it and after just a day or two it's perfect for the space. I bought it for my travel trailer, to keep our toothbrushes and toothpaste up off the counter and from falling all over the place as we tow it down the road and it's perfect for that. It holds all of our toothbrushes and toothpaste and the little cups are super handy; I really like that they keep the toothbrushes from getting dusty as we roll down the road!
customer_reviews.author: mommyh

customer_reviews.title: Got creative to make it hold, nice item
customer_reviews.text: Love the item. After reading the reviews that stated sticker does not hold item up for a long time. I decided to be creative and make some holes in the back with a drill. I did holes 2-3 inches apart similar to the holes you see in the 2nd picture i added. This allows the item to go on the screws mounted on the wall then slide down the skinny slit for a secured fit
customer_reviews.author: Bxbobby

customer_reviews.title: great for our travel trailer
customer_reviews.text: I put this in our travel trailer camper and it has worked great! I was worried it would be too heavy to put on the 'cheap' trailer walls but it has stuck all spring/summer/fall and stays strong. I do take the cups off while we are traveling and put them back on when we are camping. This works great for us.
customer_reviews.author: Sara J Ruppel

customer_reviews.title: A win-win product.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for our grandchildren when they come to our home. I assigned the color two boys and a girl, in their age order.😂😂 is a win-win, no confusion for the three of them and easy to access and no mess. Easy to assemble and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Soldierpastor

customer_reviews.title: Super handy
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved this. Installed in my kids bathroom. I put their names on the cups so everyone has their own spot for their toothbrush. Able to store 3 different toothpaste tubes as well.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Stop looking and get this
customer_reviews.text: My husband put this up over a month ago and it is still going strong. We didn't need to adhere it with anything else but what was provided so I'm pretty happy with it! I love that it keeps our toothbrushes covered but not in a grimy case. I suggest this to all my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Rose Fulgham

customer_reviews.title: It worked great at first but then the sticky square lost some ...
customer_reviews.text: It worked great at first but then the sticky square lost some of its adhesion and fell off. I tried finding something to work in its place but so far no luck with, gorilla glue strips of 3m mounting tape. It would be great if it could actually stick on the tile for longer than a week.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Cups are comfortable and good sized.
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting a much smaller item. I was pleasantly surprised that the cups seem to be fairly sturdy and reasonably sized. (note: the dimensions are listed, but I just had a smaller and less sturdy item in my head) Will see if there is problems with the adhesive as some have said, but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: SWright

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with this purchase! Was thrilled to mount this and free up the counter space in my kids' bathroom. When mounting, I did use two anchored screws in the plastic mounting plate, just to give a little extra added support to the adhesive strip.
customer_reviews.author: C. Murdaugh

customer_reviews.title: No More Wasted Dixie Cups
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely cringe at uncovered toothbrushes in a bathroom. Having this unit eases my angst in regards to airborne bathroom germs. I love that the complete unit is easily washable also. Although I wish the colors were bolder, I'm happy that it works for me and my son. AND....no more wasteful dixie cups...
customer_reviews.author: C. Stephan

customer_reviews.title: Love the extra counter space!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I attached it to my mirror because my tiny bathroom left few other options. It's been a few weeks, and so far it hasn't budged. I appreciate the extra counter space! I would love to see an option for more neutral colors, but these colors are fun and my kids love it.
customer_reviews.author: Sonya

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful for family of 6!
customer_reviews.text: Was pessimistic but was pleasantly surprised! I have 4 kids and hate the mess of toothbrush holders all over our small counter. Kids love this, it covers the tops of the toothbrushes As well which protects from particles being sprayed by toilet flushing. So far it's been up a month and tape strip is holding to wall very well. Also holds certain brands of the kids battery operated toothbrushes.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Oehlschlaeger

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product for anyone, but amazing for a larger family. There is plenty if space for toothbrushes, toothpaste, razors, etc. Stuck it on my bathroom mirror, and so far, it has held well.
customer_reviews.author: Bennah

customer_reviews.title: nice for large families
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice holder for larger families. The only issue we had is it falling off the first night. The sticky just wasn't sticky enough. If it falls again we will just buy some 3m double sided tape.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this item
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend this item! The sticky thing that attaches it to the wall is very strong, I was worried it wouldn’t hold the weight of several tubes of toothpaste, but so far, so good! And my kids are actually using it instead of leaving their toothbrushes all over the counter
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Not strong came out of the wall within a week
customer_reviews.text: I bought it because I have a small bathroom so I don't have enough space in top for brush. It Looks nice but within a week it came out from the wall. Wasting of money and damaged my wall, I want my money back
customer_reviews.author: Hazera Choudhury

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I thought the adhesive was going to be terrible but ut works great no problems so far even with my kids using it it hasnt moved yet so im happy.
customer_reviews.author: Nina.D

customer_reviews.title: Does a good job keeping the toothbrushes and tooth paste off the ...
customer_reviews.text: Does a good job keeping the toothbrushes and tooth paste off the counter to make it less cluttered. Kids like it. I like that the cups cover the brushes as well. Stuck it to my mirror and the adhesive is so strong that it is slightly crooked as I could not even move it once partially sticking one side of the adhesive to it. So I am sure if I put it on the wall it would have stuck just fine too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It’s great! My kids always want to wash there teeth now 😊
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AA+++
customer_reviews.text: i love these, very practical very useful. Plastic is thick. the sticker is super strong, i sticked it on the mirror, i tried to pull it off but it wouldnt come off ( it will if i try hard). I don't have to worry that it's gonna fall off.
customer_reviews.author: Philip teo

customer_reviews.title: Great way to organize the bathroom
customer_reviews.text: This is a great purchase. I love how it cleaned up our messy counter and gives our kids each a reusable cup. Only thing I wish was that there were more color choices.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: I loved it. It’s still stuck on the bathroom wall ...
customer_reviews.text: I loved it. It’s still stuck on the bathroom wall and the kids love it since we don’t have much surface area to put a toothbrush and cups. I love this product. And it’s cute too
customer_reviews.author: twincorgi

customer_reviews.title: Stick
customer_reviews.text: Came off the wall. Stopped sticking.It should come with an extra sticker , other than that its ok.
customer_reviews.author: John Kiego Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Stuck easily to our mirror & has held up to use by not super gentle kiddos. Only critic is that my daughter’s toothpaste won’t fit in storage slot (special needs, so can only use specific toothpaste that comes in hard plastic tube). Best. Buy. Ever.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this toothbrush holder!
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this toothbrush holder. They love that it has storage on the top to put their combs and toothpaste. My husband loves it because now their toothbrushes aren't all over the bathroom counter. Easy to attach to the wall, no problems with this product. Would definitely recommend this product and would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Robertson

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! Toothbrush holds very well in place and the kids love using their cups!! I never write a review but this product is so good I just had to leave a review!
customer_reviews.author: Cori

customer_reviews.title: Love this tooth brush holder
customer_reviews.text: Love this tooth brush holder! Easy to install and so far it stands up to my 3 and 4 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen S.

customer_reviews.title: A great bathroom organizer especially for kids who love to use it
customer_reviews.text: Makes the bathroom look normal again. We have three young kids and toothbrushes all over the place we're getting to be a mess. This does the job and looks very nice too
customer_reviews.author: DMV Mom

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: So far loving this! Easy to install. It has held up well so far. Mounts on Wall with a sticky pad. And has been up for about a month now. I do wish it had screws to secure it. But seems fine. Fast shipping
customer_reviews.author: A.A

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and added storage
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install, it really is peel and stick to the wall. Plenty of space for toothbrushes and extra storage for toothpaste. I haven't used the extra storage because my kids use standup toothpaste tube that cant fit in the extra storage. Overall happy with purchase
customer_reviews.author: SYR

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for 3 years now and it still sticks on . We’ve moved twice already
customer_reviews.author: Ana Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Good product - no cups included!
customer_reviews.text: This was good but did not come with the cups so pay attention to that! I didn’t hang it but am using it by sitting it on my sink.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Great product, would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.text: I love this! It stays up very well on the wall even though my kids are fairly rough when grabbing their toothbrushes. I was worried my daughter's motorized toothbrush wouldn't fit but it does! Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... were a little larger and the cups looked less like they belong in a nursery bathroom
customer_reviews.text: I wish the slots behind the cups were a little larger and the cups looked less like they belong in a nursery bathroom, but this item is very serviceable and definitely helps clear off my tiny vanity. It was easy to stick to the wall with the included adhesive.
customer_reviews.author: Marilla Burns

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied. Item as described.
customer_reviews.text: Just received the item today. Put it right up. So far so good. My family likes it. Keeps things in one place. I'm just afraid one day, the things that hold toot brushes will break. But let's see how long it will last. The item looks exactly like the pictures. Easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan N.

customer_reviews.title: Easy, functional
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Adhesion is so far so good. Have had it in the shower for about a month now with no issues. Very functional.
customer_reviews.author: Grace J

customer_reviews.title: Protect your toothbrushes
customer_reviews.text: Great product to keep bathrooms neat and clean. Toothbrushes are protected from splatter and toothpastes can be kept organized. I love the fact that you can have up to three toothbrushes per person, allowing you to have different types of toothbrushes.
customer_reviews.author: SSH

customer_reviews.title: Why is this so convenient
customer_reviews.text: I never thought about how I would use this until I got it on a whim, and I must say I WON'T GO BACK EVER!!! this has changed my brushing routine and just makes everything so organized I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Chi Chi

customer_reviews.title: This product worked so good and is super cute
customer_reviews.text: This product worked so good and is super cute !! I thought the adhesive back wouldn't stick on the wall but it did! I absolutely love it !!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product makes restroom look very organized. Would buy it again. Helps maintain hygiene with toothbrushes and water cups. 5 👍 up!
customer_reviews.author: NAYE MORALES

customer_reviews.title: Although I love the concept of this
customer_reviews.text: Although I love the concept of this.... it kept falling off the mirror anytime anyone took a shower. It was really disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Reanna B.

customer_reviews.title: Neat looking space saver
customer_reviews.text: Received product as described and made it simple and effective to mount. As i had a less space and this was perfect fit for me and looks neat.
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: Great way to hold toothbrushes.
customer_reviews.text: We got these a while ago and love how it holds them. My kids love the cups.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT! With little space in our bathroom
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT! With little space in our bathroom, this has been a God send. Lots of room for your morning routine and the kids love the bright colors making it easier to remind them to brush their teeth on a regular basis. Very easy to set up, you will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Bkrawlings

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We love this! Makes our bathroom so much more organized and frees up counter space! Easy to install!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Scuderi

customer_reviews.title: Use the Provided Adhesive!
customer_reviews.text: The packaging and product are so lovely! Command Strips, including velcro, will not hold this up. You must adhere the caddy to a mirror with the provided sticker. Has not fallen down since. So colorful and worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: I Love it so much.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Just make sure u are sure where you want it before you stick it because it is very strong glue. I highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and effective
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome! It keeps the tooth brushes covered, I use the topper to double as a water cup sometimes. It also fits my box of contacts in the storage portion. I only wish it came in another color but I might paint mine.
customer_reviews.author: LaurenLunacy

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a small bathrooms with no counter space and a family of 6.
customer_reviews.author: Eternal✝️Bliss🔆

customer_reviews.title: Wont stay on
customer_reviews.text: I loved it. Except It won't stay on my mirror. It keeps falling off. Unable to reach the company for another glue pad. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Debbie ybarra

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to setup and very useful in our bathroom. No more messy and cluttered sink space.
customer_reviews.author: Ferrety

customer_reviews.title: The picture is true to the product and it holds weight like shown. Mounting it on the wall was the ...
customer_reviews.text: With a person who has 4 kids in the home, this came in handy. The picture is true to the product and it holds weight like shown. Mounting it on the wall was the only thing that I had trouble with, but the instructions were very clear. I would recommend this to anyone who needs extra space in the bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Space saver
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for small cabinet space and if you have more than 1 child
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Was as described, finally got excess items off the bathroom vanity. Innovative adhesive mount allows for removal for cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: john kucher

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: nice to finally have an organized way to store toothbrushes.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Cute colorful set that hangs in the bathroom and keeps our toothpaste and brushes clean and organized. The adhesive tape on the back doesnt hold well, I had to hang it on thumb tacks on the wall to keep it from falling. Guests always compliment this holder!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for large
customer_reviews.text: A real space saver in the bathroom. Great for large families
customer_reviews.author: Leow Wei Qiang

customer_reviews.title: Don't load it up with too much!!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this! It's perfect do us. Saves counter space and holds a good amount of stuff. However, be careful how much you put in. Ours crashed down in the middle of the night. It's now being reinforced by duct tape!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Seems great do far
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our 3 kids. I have attached it to the mirror and it's held up the last 4 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: JJC

customer_reviews.title: Broke within days of using- the tray fell and everything ...
customer_reviews.text: Broke within days of using- the tray fell and everything crashed to the floor, breaking all three cups and then tray
customer_reviews.author: McK

customer_reviews.title: I was a little skeptical but I hung this about ...
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical but I hung this about 2 months ago and it has held up! I thought for sure it would have fell down by now with my 4 younger kids using it, but it’s still hanging in there strong!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: But it works fine for my kids little brushes
customer_reviews.text: Not big enough to hold my electric toothbrush. But it works fine for my kids little brushes.
customer_reviews.author: BFinch

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This product keeps our children's stuff organized and clean. It saves a lot of space. I sticked this onto the mirror. I found it more secure than sticking it to the wall. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Only A Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed! It comes with a sticky adhesive to attach ...
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed! It comes with a sticky adhesive to attach to wall! Very cheap! It fell off the wall right away and will not stay up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price realy good idem i wold buy it again
customer_reviews.text: This is the best toothbrush holder i ever got!all of as like it a lot in are family!
customer_reviews.author: Zsanett kobo so

customer_reviews.title: Best thing ever
customer_reviews.text: I love this! I wanted something for our small bathroom to save space and this has it all. It's been up for about two weeks and hasn't budged. The design is just awesome and holds so many things while keeping your toothbrush covered but allows it to dry.
customer_reviews.author: PAC

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! Perfect for kids bathroom. Up about 2 months holdingg secure! Perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: Holli C. Childs

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Easy to mount. My two young children can easily access everything to brush their teeth. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Paul Hunter

customer_reviews.title: ... the wall within 2 hours not sure I have bad luck anyway
customer_reviews.text: Not strong came out of the wall within 2 hours not sure I have bad luck anyway.. cups looks very nice so decided to use only cups.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald

customer_reviews.title: What a ripoff!
customer_reviews.text: When I tried to return this, because it's larger and brighter than expected, it costs half what the product does. It doesn't look like it's neon colored on my screen! So I can't give it a good review since I never used it. All I did was open the box and was highly disappointed with the item. This is the only reason why brick and mortar stores exist. When you buy something and take it back, they refund ALL of your money not half.
customer_reviews.author: ShoeQueenofMSTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Cleans up your bathroom!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product that was easy to mount and it cleaned up our bathroom sink right away! Our son loves it. After 8 months, my only complaint is the top plastic lip came loose. Pictured below. Nothing a little tape or glue won't fix!
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: I love this little holder
customer_reviews.text: I love this little holder! Its perfect sized for our tiny bathroom. The adhesive is very strong like others have commented.
customer_reviews.author: Meaghan

customer_reviews.title: So far so good..
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I needed for my kids bathroom!
customer_reviews.author: browneyes

customer_reviews.title: The cups come off easily to use as a rinse cup but cover all ...
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I needed for my camper! We are a family of 4 in a smaller camper with an all in 1 wet bath. The only sink is in the kitchen area. I was worried about storing toothbrushes near food and cleaning supplies, so I decided to put them in the wardrobe area. It holds 9 toothbrushes, even electric! The cups come off easily to use as a rinse cup but cover all the toothbrushes to keep them clean.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Strong and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Spacious to keep the electric tooth brushes. I am not sure how the stick works as I am using it on the counter top. Looks strong and sturdy and is made of good quality stainless steel. Totally happy with the purchase and helps me keep my bath room organized.
customer_reviews.author: shesa

customer_reviews.title: Great toothbrush product
customer_reviews.text: So far holding up great and love the multiple colors and several holders we have a big family. Family of 7 kids and 2 adults so you can see why we thought to try this. Definitely spacious and holds all of our tooth brushes. Plus different toothpastes for the different age ranges. Fluoride free, kids with fluoride plus teenage and adult toothpaste with still some space in the cubbies above. If you are a big fa!ily this is a must have.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It worked as expected and looks good. For those who had issue with the adhesive ...
customer_reviews.text: It worked as expected and looks good. For those who had issue with the adhesive it came with falling off the wall, I just use 3m double sided tape along with the adhesive it came with that fixed the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Raven

customer_reviews.title: Good buy, would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I was leary about using the adhesive for our rental walls so we used command strips and tried it on the mirror, it fell off after my son took a shower. So we moved it a little farther from the shower and it seems to be holding up just fine so far. I really like the design other than the smaller sections for toothpaste storage, I could use wider areas to get more stuff off of the countertop.
customer_reviews.author: Lachelle Garner

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant idea!
customer_reviews.text: This is a brilliant product and works perfectly! I haven’t had any issues with it sticking to wall, and my kids don’t use any fines while using it, they are rough boys!! We washed the wall and installed per instructions and have had no issues, it’s been many months.
customer_reviews.author: SoccerMom

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. I’m glad I found this product. I wish I found it sooner. No more toothpaste or toothbrushes laying on the sink. The cup are excellent for my 6yr old and 4yr old. They can easily use it and they actually love to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriella Budonaro

customer_reviews.title: Not working for our RV
customer_reviews.text: It’s as described. I bought this for our RV to save space. It’s rather big. That was a little disappointing but not the sellers fault. It also does not stay on the wall with the stick on pad it can’t with. I think it’s too heavy. I keep having to rehang it and that’s annoying
customer_reviews.author: JLK

customer_reviews.title: exactly what we wanted
customer_reviews.text: This toothbrush holder is awesome. I wish it came in different colors like neutrals since we don't have children but wanted something for our bathroom. I love that the toothbrushes are covered by the cups but easily accessible and it's nice to be able to use the cups if we want. We're also able to store some things like toothpaste, lotion, nail files, etc.
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: ... for a few weeks now and although I’m mostly pleased because it frees up my sink
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had it installed for a few weeks now and although I’m mostly pleased because it frees up my sink, the toothbrush holder has broken on the middle section. I can’t hang any on the middle bars. I’m considering how to fix... maybe some gorilla glue?
customer_reviews.author: labyrinth_lady8

customer_reviews.title: Great toothbrush holder
customer_reviews.text: So far it is holding well. Lots of room. Fits all of our dental products. Please note that the openings don't fit electric toothbrush, I went ahead and put it in one of the compartments on top.
customer_reviews.author: Jen74

customer_reviews.title: Functional and handy
customer_reviews.text: This works great to give back counter space on our small sink. The worst part is both daughters fought over who gets the pink cup...
customer_reviews.author: Kelly J D

customer_reviews.title: Excellent toothbrush holder
customer_reviews.text: Update 11/26/2018: A year and a half went by without problem. The little tabs that hold the cups feel a little flimpsy but they’re still holding up great. Ordered another set in different color for second bathroom. Pretty nice holder. Good for family of 3. Daughter and wife love it.
customer_reviews.author: Ben P.

customer_reviews.title: Really really really great, holds several toothbrushes
customer_reviews.text: Really really really great, holds several toothbrushes, and the storage behind the cups is great too. we have one in our main bathroom, and ordered a 2nd one for our camper :)
customer_reviews.author: Sean Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we needed
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what we needed. I'm so pleased with this product. So far the adhesive is holding tight, but it's only been a couple days. There are plenty of slots for toothbrushes - it holds electric toothbrushes no problem. My kids love the cups.
customer_reviews.author: misterpaws

customer_reviews.title: This was easy to put on my wall
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to put on my wall. It protects my toothbrushes and keeps my bathroom sink area clear. It was a great purchase as I have a small sink with next to no counter space. It fits all our toothbrushes. Even my son's toddler toothbrush.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Premont

customer_reviews.title: ... our toothbrushes didn't fit (I am sure it works fine for standard toothbrushes)
customer_reviews.text: Wouldn't stay stuck to the wall and our toothbrushes didn't fit (I am sure it works fine for standard toothbrushes). We use them only on the counter now and keep the brushes in each person's cup.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this, but, I feel like the little plastic parts that hold the cups ate flimsy and will undoubtedly end up breaking with daily use, especially when small children are using the cups daily and pulling them off and putting them back on.
customer_reviews.author: Heather S.

customer_reviews.title: Great product for small bathrooms
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and looks great. There are plenty of room for more toothbrushes and the kids love the colors
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: This thing is amazing. I used it for our RV trip
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing. I used it for our RV trip. We usually rent an rv every year. We are a family of 6 and I used 3 3M strips on the back to affix to the wall. We used it with not problems the whole trip and gently pulled the strips out and clean wall and holder ready for another use.
customer_reviews.author: Lenos

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I love the product for my bathroom. Very sturdy and large enough to fit my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn F.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, Awesome, space saver, kid friendly, well built, easy install, etc...
customer_reviews.author: VigorGS

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for big family
customer_reviews.text: Family of 6. Reviews don't do it justice. So easy to install and it looks amazing. I have four little ones and this is up and out the way. It also looks great. I will be buying another and putting it up in the second bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical about it staying on the wall but it’s not budging. Saves a lot of counter space.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: it's very cute but It doesn't stick anywhere.. ...
customer_reviews.text: it's very cute but It doesn't stick anywhere...I tried on the wall the mirror and cabinets...it should give you the option to put screws...I have to return it...
customer_reviews.author: Surfer mom

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how or why this product has any bad reviews. I've had it for a few weeks right now and it sticks perfectly and it's very useful! It frees up a lot of room in my bathroom. Definitely would recommend to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Antonio

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: It really stick to the wall and hold the 8 toothbrushes on my house. Love it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: KarlaIOM

product_meta.title: WARMLIFE Toothbrush Holder for Bathroom Electric Toothbrush Holder Wall Mounted or Stand Large Stainless Steel Multifunctional Tooth Brush Holder … (Silver)
feature_bullets: Large capacity: 5 slots can organize family's toothbrushes, electric toothbrushes, toothpaste, combs, facial cleanser, etc. You can save space with the bathroom organizer and keep the washstand clean and tidy without worrying about mess. The 3 hooks can also hold 2 mouthwash cups and 1 razor.

Easy to install: You can choose wall-mounted or stand according to your personal preferences. No drill, no tools, easy to install and will not damage the surface of the wall, please clean the wall of the bathroom before installation, firmly press the adhesive strip, and let the adhesive strip fully adhere to the wall for 2 hours before use.

Durable: Strong non-marking adhesive strip with excellent caulking effect. Whether it is plastic, metal, wood, paper, mirror, ceramic tile or uneven walls, it can be firmly bonded, and it is suitable for high and low temperature environments with good durability. The longer the load time, the tighter the suction. We have also presented a strong non-marking adhesive strip for you to change the position.

Easy to clean: The cup holder can be placed upside down on the toothbrush holder, dustproof, fast draining, sanitary and healthy. The whole body is waterproof and can be washed directly with water for easy cleaning.
Excellent material: high-quality stainless steel, no rust, no mildew. The arc design has no right angles, smooth and uncut hands, safe to use.
